title: Learning about water
creator_credit: Gay Courter, Philip Courter, Stelios Roccos and ACI Films
brief_description: Uses simple experiments to demonstrate the scientific properties of water. Shows that water can change forms from liquid to vapor through evaporation and condensation. It also depicts, through use of a model farm, how it can power a water wheel, irrigate paddocks and cause erosion. Suitable for middle and upper primary levels.
